body: Built by [Only](https://onlydigital.ru/) for Russian industrial manufacturer Penzgidromash. > The main activity of Penzhydromash is the creation of systems for the oil, gas, chemical and petrochemical industries. Features include a bold use of imagery which combines well with a striking black & blue theme, brilliant use of WebGL scroll animation and a neat initial page loader. [Check them out](http://penzgidromash.com/)!
title: Penzgidromash
